episodes.title: The true face of jehovah's witnesses (Dr. James R White)
episodes.description:
Renewed Mind is a TV Program that deals with the attraction that this world system has and its desire to conform us to its mould. Instead of ignoring the varied attacks against Holy Scripture, ‘Renewed Mind’ confronts any valid claim or accusation and demonstrates its error through godly speakers that are well equipped to deal with the topic being discussed. Its aim is to give clarity through the Gospel message by directing its viewers to the person of Jesus as Lord and Saviour. This program is brought to you by Christian Media Productions (CMP), a non-denominational and not-for-profit ministry whose pursuit is to proclaim the Good News of Jesus to all the World.


Dr. James White is the director of Alpha and Omega Ministries, a Christianapologetics organization based in Phoenix, Arizona. He is the author ofmore than twenty books, a professor, an accomplished debater, and an elderof the Phoenix Reformed Baptist Church.
